attributes.action: Decrease the 120 qualifying time for GSM for those who served in Cyprus in 1956
attributes.additional_details: Gsm medal issued in any other conflict is 30 days throughout the world Cyprus in the 1950's where there were more lives lost then : than the lives lost in  Afghanistan& iraq Most servicemen who served in Cyprus in the 50's served 90 days & put their lives on the line for King & Queen & country those people some of whom lost their lives or got wounded or were lucky to return unharmed.? never the less they should be recognised for that fact that they were there But didn't get the 1918 to 1962 GSM > So come on MOD how about allowing those who served there by dropping the qualifying time 120  days to 30days which is the normal qualification time every where else in conflicts throughout the world....
